com.epoch
Class Question

java.lang.Object
  com.epoch.Question
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChemConstants, FormatConstants, QuestionConstants, EvalResultConstants, OneEvalConstants, TranslationConstants, XMLConstants
public class Question
extends Object
implements ChemConstants, EvalResultConstants, OneEvalConstants, QuestionConstants, TranslationConstants

An ACE question, formerly called a problem.

Field Summary
private  List<Evaluator> allEvaluators
          All evaluators, simple or complex, for this question.
 String authorId
          Author of the question; null for master database questions.
private  String book
          Textbook from which this question derives.
private  String chapter
          Chapter number of the textbook from which this question derives, or the initials of the author of the question if the textbook is "Other".
private  boolean corrupted
          Indicates if question could not properly be downloaded from database.
private  int editType
          Status of a locally authored question; may have values SAME, CHANGED, NEW.
private  List<Figure> figures
          The question figure or figures, formerly called references; may be none.
private  boolean isMasterQ
          Indicates if this question is from the master database.
private  String keywords
          Stored but not current used for anything; will eventually be used to sort questions by their characteristics.
 String miscMessage
          Error message to the author if the question could not be saved.
 String origStatement
          A copy of the question statement, used to see if the question statement has changed before keeping/erasing its translations.
private  int phraseId
          ID used for translations of the question statement.
private  List<QDatum> qData
          Items to rank or from which to choose (rank, multiple choice, fill-in-the-blank); may also contain allowed reactions (multistep syntheses questions) or R group classes (R-group questions).
private  int qFlags
          Sometimes referred to as "qType".
private  int qId
          Distinguishes this question from all others.
private  int qSetId
          Unique ID of QSet in which this Q resides.
private  String remarks
          Number of the question in the chapter and textbook.
private  int serialNo
          Order within a topic; not currently used.
private  String statement
          The question statement; may or may not include the common question statement (or header) of the question set to which this question belongs, depending on the database call when the question was loaded.

Field Detail

qId

private final int qId
Distinguishes this question from all others.

qSetId

private int qSetId
Unique ID of QSet in which this Q resides.

authorId

public String authorId
Author of the question; null for master database questions.

serialNo

private int serialNo
Order within a topic; not currently used.

qFlags

private int qFlags
Sometimes referred to as "qType". The lowest 6 bits are for 64 distinct question types; the remaining bits indicate display options.

Any changes here require changes wherever qType is used, such as mainheader.jsp, problem.jsp, addheader.jsp.
Also add new question types to switch statement in evaluateResponse() below.

keywords

private String keywords
Stored but not current used for anything; will eventually be used to sort questions by their characteristics.

statement

private String statement
The question statement; may or may not include the common question statement (or header) of the question set to which this question belongs, depending on the database call when the question was loaded.

origStatement

public String origStatement
A copy of the question statement, used to see if the question statement has changed before keeping/erasing its translations.

phraseId

private int phraseId
ID used for translations of the question statement.

figures

private List<Figure> figures
The question figure or figures, formerly called references; may be none.

See Also:
Figure

qData

private List<QDatum> qData
Items to rank or from which to choose (rank, multiple choice, fill-in-the-blank); may also contain allowed reactions (multistep syntheses questions) or R group classes (R-group questions).

See Also:
QDatum

allEvaluators

private List<Evaluator> allEvaluators
All evaluators, simple or complex, for this question.

See Also:
Evaluator

book

private String book
Textbook from which this question derives.

chapter

private String chapter
Chapter number of the textbook from which this question derives, or the initials of the author of the question if the textbook is "Other".

remarks

private String remarks
Number of the question in the chapter and textbook.

miscMessage

public String miscMessage
Error message to the author if the question could not be saved. Also used to store the common Q statement for display in preview.

editType

private int editType
Status of a locally authored question; may have values SAME, CHANGED, NEW. Used only temporarily by QSet.java.

corrupted

private boolean corrupted
Indicates if question could not properly be downloaded from database.

isMasterQ

private boolean isMasterQ
Indicates if this question is from the master database.

                                  throws ResponseParseException,
                                         ResponseFormatException

Returns:
result of the evaluation
Throws:

                                         String[] userLangs)
                                  throws ResponseParseException,
                                         ResponseFormatException

userLangs - non-English languages chosen by this user in order of preference

                             ResponseFormatException

translate

private String translate(String autoFeedback,
                         String[] userLangs)
Translates autoFeedback into one of the user's preferred languages.

Parameters:

userLangs - languages preferred by the user in order of preference
Returns:
translated autoFeedback, or English if no appropriate translation is available

translate

private void translate(String[] autoFeedback,
                       String[] userLangs)
Translates array of autoFeedback into one of the user's preferred languages. Modifies the original.

Parameters:
autoFeedback - array of autoFeedback to translate
userLangs - languages preferred by the user in order of preference

translate

private String translate(OneEvalResult oneEvalResult,
                         String[] userLangs)
Translates autofeedback into one of the user's preferred languages. May incorporate a variable part into the autofeedback. Variable parts may be substituted for the demarcated part of a phrase or inserted around it; they may be translated or not.

Parameters:
oneEvalResult - contains the autofeedback; may also contain variable parts to substitute into it and flags for how to handle them
userLangs - languages preferred by the user in order of preference
Returns:
translated autoFeedback, or English if no appropriate translation is available

modifyFailureString

private void modifyFailureString(OneEvalResult oneEvalResult)
Modifies the verification failure message to include the row or column caption. This method relies on the message having a format where the word "row" or "column" is followed by a space, a number, and then another space. If any exception is thrown, never mind.

Parameters:
oneEvalResult - the OneEvalResult containing the verification error message.

modifyResponse

private void modifyResponse(OneEvalResult oneEvalResult,
                            EvaluationResult allEvalsResult,
                            Response response)
Stores a modified response to highlight an aspect of it.

Parameters:
oneEvalResult - the result of a single top-level evaluator
allEvalsResult - the result of overall evaluation
response - the response

public String makeFileName(int numberForName,
                           String extension)
Makes a filename to contain an image of a figure or qDatum. If the image is a figure of type IMAGE, shouldn't add the extension to the filename, because the image may not be a JPEG.

Parameters:
numberForName - unique ID of preexisting figure or question datum, or serial number for a new Figure, or 0 for a new question datum
extension - extension to add to the filename; empty Stringi f should not add one
Returns:
name of file to which to write figure

toXML

public List<String> toXML()
                   throws ParameterException
Converts a question to XML.

Returns:
list of strings: [0] contains the XML, any further ones contain image filenames
Throws:
ParameterException - never

                                 throws ParameterException

translations of question statement, evaluators, and question data
Throws:
